item.title: Kristin add a quote by Cathy Allen
item.description: "Life brings simple pleasures to us every day. It is up to us to make them wonderful memories." -- Cathy Allen

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Evan Esar
item.description: "Family: A social unit where the father is concerned with parking space, the children with outer space, and the mother with closet space." -- Evan Esar

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Mother Teresa of Calcutta
item.description: "The greatest science in the world; in heaven and on earth; is love." -- Mother Teresa of Calcutta

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Be careful what you water your dreams with. Water them with worry and fear and you will produce weeds that choke the life from your dream. Water them with optimism and solutions and you will cultivate success. Always be on the lookout for ways to turn a problem into an opportunity for success. Always be on the lookout for ways to nurture your dream." -- Lao Tzu
